mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, SUB2.PRO_NO AS PRO_NO, SUB2.TITLE AS PRO_TITLE, SUB2.START_DATE AS PRO_START, SUB2.FINISH_DATE AS PRO_END, SUB2.MEMBER_NO AS PRO_MEM, T.TITLE AS T_TITLE, T.START_DATE AS T_START, T.START_DATE + (DURATION-1) AS T_END FROM (SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM, PM.PRO_NO, P.TITLE, P.START_DATE, P.FINISH_DATE, PM.MEMBER_NO FROM TB_PROJECT P JOIN TB_PROJECT_MEMBER PM ON (P.PRO_NO = PM.PRO_NO) WHERE PM.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND P.DELETED = 'N' AND (SYSDATE >= P.START_DATE AND SYSDATE <= FINISH_DATE) ORDER BY P.PRO_NO) SUB1 WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) SUB2 JOIN TB_TASK T ON (SUB2.PRO_NO = T.PRO_NO) JOIN TB_TASK_MEMBER TM ON (T.IDE_NO = TM.IDE_NO AND SUB2.PRO_NO = TM.PRO_NO AND SUB2.MEMBER_NO = TM.MEMBER_NO) WHERE T.START_DATE <= SYSDATE AND T.START_DATE + (DURATION-1) >= SYSDATE ORDER BY T.START_DATE) SUB3 WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}
SELECT PRO_NO FROM TB_PROJECT WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC
SELECT IDE_NO FROM TB_TASK WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY IDE_NO DESC
